Name: Fake World VR
About the game: A simple shooter with weird controls; fight through levels filled with shape monsters to discover the Fake World's true origins. Built for VR Fake World utilizes the HTC Vive's hardware to create a completely unique gaming experience Fake World brings innovative new movement systems to the VR scene; you have never played anything like Fake World Movement and Combat Move freely through levels in zero gravity by throwing your move sphere and absorbing its velocity After a few levels unlock and experience a transformative new teleportation mechanic Fight through hoards of enemies Dodge and shoot down enemy bullets to survive Throw your ball to move in it's direction
Meta Title: Fake World VR: Aug 25, 2017, Brett Loland and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fake World VR? Check out the release date (Aug 25, 2017), developer insights from Brett Loland, and a complete game summary.
